alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 5:57PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding and runoff caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The Tamarack Burn Scar in Douglas County including Double Spring Flat. * WHEN...Until 745 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas is possible along with debris runoff from the Tamarack burn scar. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 553 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Areas of flooding are expected in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has already fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tamarack burn scar including Double Spring Flat. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
